sc.networking.clients

Class LobbyClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • sc.networking.clients.XStreamClient
      • sc.networking.clients.LobbyClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPollsHistory

    public final class LobbyClient
extends XStreamClient
implements IPollsHistory
    This class is used to handle all communication with a server. It is used in a client (e.g. the java simple client). It is also used to represent observer-threads started by the server which connect to the server. The server always has a sc.server.network.Client object for every LobbyClient representing the client on the server-side.
